title: Village gives us hot deals for the new year!
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065127/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 9.Jan.2006 11.33am 

/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /

Happy new year to everyone. We wish you happiness and success in 2006.

As 2005 drew to a close, the good folks at Typographica released their “Favorite Fonts of 2005 - Part 1”, with 5 Village exclusives on the list. They are:  
/ Arrival by Keith Chi-hang Tam from Type Initiative  
/ Crank 8 by Greg Lindy & Henk Elenga from Lux Typographics  
/ Flama by Mario Feliciano from Feliciano Type Foundry  
/ Garda by Mario Feliciano from Feliciano Type Foundry  
/ Litteratra by Karsten Luecke from KLTF

The designers have gotten together and put together a special deal for this package of five notable type families. You can purchase the set for US$575.00, a savings of one-third off the combined price of US$865.00. (That’s a savings of US$190.00.)

[http://vllg.com/offers.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065127/http:/vllg.com/offers.php "http://vllg.com/offers.php")

This offer will be available through March 31, 2006.

With best regards from the Village people.

Village  
168 Second Avenue #253  
New York NY 10003  
USA

telephone ++1 646 654 1506  
fax ++1 646 429 8597

[http://vllg.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811065127/http:/vllg.com/ "http://vllg.com")

/ / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / / /
author: Miss Tiffany
